subtitle: A really easy all-in-one meal.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Cook the onion and garlic for about 2 min or until just softened. Remove from the pan and brush the potato slices with any remaining oil from the frying pan.
In an ovenproof dish, layer the vegetables and bacon, seasoning each layer. Pour over the chicken stock. Cover dish with foil and bake for 20 min.
Remove the foil and continue to cook for a further 15-20 min or until pale golden brown and tender.

title: Herbed leek, bacon and potato au gratin
